summary: Alice and Lester move to a new town, where their dad's bought a music store. Alice starts in 6th grade and joins the theater club, hoping to be the musical's princess. She's insecure but imagines herself cool, cute and confident.
cast: Alyson Stoner|Luke Perry|Lucas Grabeel|Penny Marshall|Ashley Eckstein|Parker McKenna Posey|Dylan McLaughlin|Bridgit Mendler|Ann Dowd|Jilanne Marie Klaus|Jona Xiao|Boris Kodjoe|Monica Parks|Lindsey Trout|Alexandria Basso|Dan Chopin|Belinda Quimby|Christian Probst|Anthony Engle|Ayse Eren|Jordan Pfeifer|Richard Klos|Amy Sparrow|John Golden|Joshua Olsen|Scott McMaster|Amy Holland Pennell|Monica Perry|Charity Barger|Gabriel Basso|Natalie Bram|Ed Callison|Eileen Engel|Carolyn Gibson|Matthew Gowan|Joe Hammerstone|Grace Hinson|BJ Lange|Train Mayer|Aleh Neliubin|Laura Paige|Patrick Probst|Haley Schneider|Alan Sciranko|Laura Sexauer|Tyler Shaw|Jaxon Stanford|Barb J. title: Alice Upside Down
